description: This file sets up a knowledge base using LanceDB with PDFs from URLs, configures an agent with OpenAI models, and performs a question-answering task related to recipes, specifically for Thai chicken and galangal in coconut milk soup.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDFs from URLs into a vector database.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database for storing embeddings.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with language models and knowledge bases to perform tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: A class for creating text embeddings using OpenAI models.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing the OpenAI chat model used for generating responses.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base from the specified PDFs.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given query, optionally streaming the output.
